question: In which of the following states, you will find the Gondwana hills?
explanation: Gondwana hills are not just limited in the Madhya Pradesh state, rather they spread over some regions of Telangana, Andhra Pradesh and Maharashtra. Gondwana hills are named after Gond dynasty by which it was ruled during the era of Mughals. Gonds were the tribal community more often found in the Gond forest in central India and spoke the Dravidian language.
